data.description: Find wrapper. Calls funcs based on regexes
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
File::FindByRegex is a File::Find object oriented wrapper (that is,
    it Find,s). For each visited file, executes one of several functions
    based on the regular expression matched against filename and path
    (it finds ByRegex).
